name: Ice Runner (Theoya)
description:
I created a "Mothership" enemy with its own seperate enemy script. if you kill it you win the level, and it has a bunch of guns, along with spawning more enemies

I also created a Fast Chaser, a Spawner enemy that shoots and spawns additional enemies, and a Turret enemy that move slowly, has invulnerability frames and shoots fast.

In level one you encounter some new challenging enemies.

In level two you face the Mothership.

In level three you fight through reinforcements.

In addition, the levels are custom and strung together into a narrative, A smuggler harvesting ice from alien asteroids and getting out alive.

Created by Taylor Hadfield
